attributes.action: Commit none British Subjects to Swear an Oath of Allegiance to the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain has become divided. There is also evidence that some who live in this country, work in this country, take benefits from this country then speak treason against this country upon our street.

We the People of the United Kingdom require that all none British subjects swear an Oath of Allegiance to our country before any benefits be gained.

We also require that those who preach hatred upon our street refrain from doing so and swear an Oath of Allegiance to the United Kingdom. 

Failure to comply will lead to imprisonment or deportation from the United Kingdom for life.

This is the request of the signatories listed below.
